bibl.title: Resembling Cleopatra: Cleopatra VII's Portraits in the Context of Late Hellenisitic Female Portraiture.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Accepted Greek-style portraits of Cleopatra VII. - Portraits from the eastern Mediterranean. - Female portraits from Egypt. - Portraits from Rome. - Conclusion. - Notes.
bibl.seg: HIGGS Peter, Resembling Cleopatra: Cleopatra VII's Portraits in the Context of Late Hellenisitic Female Portraiture.
Susan WALKER and Sally-Ann ASHTON (Edd.), Cleopatra Reassessed = The British Museum Occasional Paper. 103 (London, 2003) pp. 57-70, 11 figg.
[Introduction.] - Accepted Greek-style portraits of Cleopatra VII. - Portraits from the eastern Mediterranean. - Female portraits from Egypt. - Portraits from Rome. - Conclusion. - Notes.
